meta_info.name: CARE_ENTRY
meta_info.description: The abstract parent of all clinical `ENTRY` subtypes. A `CARE_ENTRY` defines protocol and guideline attributes for all clinical Entry subtypes.

attributes.name: protocol
attributes.description: Description of the method (i.e. how) the information in this entry was arrived at. For `OBSERVATIONs`, this is a description of the method or instrument used. For `EVALUATIONs`, how the evaluation was arrived at. For `INSTRUCTIONs`, how to execute the Instruction. This may take the form of references to guidelines, including manually followed and executable; knowledge references such as a paper in Medline; clinical reasons within a larger care process.

attributes.name: guideline_id
attributes.description: Optional external identifier of guideline creating this Entry if relevant.
